Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Tmfo
Reviews.Content: I've been using it for two weeks and it works fine. It has an easy way to use both chips and change configurations.

Reviews.Title: it became in a toaster, after 3 days of use
Reviews.Author: Roberto Sanchez V
Reviews.Content: I returned it after 3 days of use, because it drained the battery (even turned off) getting warm. Before the failure, the phone worked quite slow. Beware with the model: In my case this model only works in 3G with one carrier. For Venezuela, is better the S60102b

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Glenrick
Reviews.Content: Its a lovely phone and would advice anyone to buy one. It suites very well if you are a person with two phones and wishes to have the convenience of having that two phones converted into one.

Reviews.Title: Slow in running apps and too limited in memory
Reviews.Author: PYUSA
Reviews.Content: Pro - Dual SIMs worked fine.Con-1.  CPU is slow and you will have to wait very long before an app will start.  Many times it would run into error when you run several apps at the same time.  At times, when you press the tab for certain functions, it would not take you there.2.  Built in memory is too limited that after you install facebook and line, it will be full.  Moreover, you cannot move those apps to the SD.3.  Resolution of the phone is also low so pictures will be grainy.

Reviews.Title: I feel fine with it but...
Reviews.Author: Joseph2012
Reviews.Content: I thought It had a bigger screen. but in the other way it is a good cellphone, I like it and my wife too.

Reviews.Author: Jose Delgado
Reviews.Content: Yes, I am very satisfied with the purchase you have made with you, I think a serious and responsible company regarding their product ..... And the link with amazon.com is wonderful ... I have spent two years buying amazon.con and I can vote for it is a serious and responsible ...... Thanked 100% ... Jose Delgado .... from Venezuela .....

Reviews.Title: Samsung GT-S6102 Galaxy Y DUOS - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Black
Reviews.Author: luis de margarita
Reviews.Content: Very good first android, buy this cell phone to try and learn more about smart phones galaxy, able to handle two lines is the best

Reviews.Title: spot on
Reviews.Author: Edgar Garbutt
Reviews.Content: as my first smartphone i must say it fullflls all my needs in terms of reaching people, getting information etc..with its dual sim characteristics..

Reviews.Title: Basic phone
Reviews.Author: G. Williamson
Reviews.Content: It is a basic phone. I do like the dual SIM feature, however the battery life is awful. It last about a day and a half if I am lucky. I bought this phone just for travel and it serves well for that, but you better bring your charger with you.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 2G 850/900/1800/1900 MHz (Both SIMs) and 3G HSDPA 850/2100 plus GPRS/EDGE data capabilities.
Dual SIM Card Support with Dual SIM Stand-by; Android OS 2.3(Gingerbread); 3.14" TFT LCD Touchscreen with Samsung TouchWiz; Social Networking Integration; Wi-Fi with Wi-Fi Hotspot; GPS with A-GPS Support and Bluetooth v3.0 with A2DP.
HTML Browser with Adobe Flash; 832MHz Processor; Internal Memory 512 MB ROM, 384 MB RAM; MicroSD expandable up to 32GB; 3.5mm Audio Jack; MP3 and MP4 Player; SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM, RSS; Accelerometer, Proximity and Compass Sensors.
Talk time up to 9 hours - Standby up to 360 hrs.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung GT-S6102 Galaxy Y DUOS - Unlocked Phone - US Warranty - Black
